Black Diamond Business Solutions focuses on strategy initiatives with small businesses to effectively accomplish growth objectives.

Black Diamond Business Solutions is partnering with Weebly to help business owners build or improve their websites and to be more searchable. Black Diamond Business Solutions was selected as one of ten Brand Ambassadors, based on their experience in developing their Weebly website, and their website design, and development for Black Diamond‚Äôs clients.The program will provide participants with the up-to-date knowledge they need to build and update their website with ease. The series is customized for startups, entrepreneurs, and existing small business owners who immediately need a website, who are interested in learning more about websites, and those who not are satisfied with their current website and are ready to update and redesign theirs.

summary: Darryl Keeton is the Founder and Executive Leader of Black Diamond Business Solutions (BDBS), a consulting firm for small businesses.  Darryl advises small businesses, including startups, across many industries to create and achieve their vision.  He is passionate about helping businesses successfully grow and regularly contributes as a community leader.  Previously, Darryl worked as a Consultant and Senior Consultant at Deloitte & Touch√©, and as a Senior Manager at American Express.Darryl‚Äôs experience encompasses enterprise risk management, regulations and compliance, cyber security, strategic planning and development, and financial and operational process transformation.  This breadth of experience gave Darryl the ability to understand accounting, operations, and technology processes across multiple industries and markets. Since branching out on his own, Darryl has expanded his knowledge and skills to include strategic marketing development and plans.  Darryl brings his experience to small businesses to provide comprehensive solutions and services, creating financially disciplined strategic plans to build efficiencies and improve processes that achieve business goals. Interesting facts about Darryl include: ‚Ä¢	Recruited by Google and Facebook without applying and was on the winning team in the 2015 Phoenix Startup Weekend.‚Ä¢	Lead Organizer of 1 Million Cups Phoenix‚Ä¢	Member and Marketing Committee Lead for REAP (Real Engagement through Activity Philanthropy) In his free time, Darryl enjoys skiing at the highest summit of a ski resort taking on a black diamond ski terrain.  It serves as his inspiration in his business to assist small businesses in taking on their most difficult challenges.
